data.title: Business Analytics, BABA
data.meta_description: Gain expertise in business analytics at Seattle University. Master data-driven decision-making with our Business Analytics, BABA, program.
data.text:
Effective Data Analysis for Better Business

Strong statistical understanding isn’t enough in today’s business world. Companies need people who can understand the bigger context, see patterns correctly, and then use them to drive ethical and effective decision-making at every level.

In short, today’s businesses require a deep understanding of data and top-tier analytics skills. Here, you get both.

With hands-on experience using real-world data, you’ll learn to identify complex business problems in terms of analytical models, all while acquiring the skills and confidence to effectively translate your findings into recommendations for effective courses of action.

As a business analytics major, you’ll harness the power of data to help companies gain their competitive edge—and make decisions for the good of all.

In addition, our world-class advisory board includes companies such as Microsoft, Meta, AirBnB, Amazon, Boeing, and Tableau. Leaders from these companies regularly visit campus to mentor, speak, teach and recruit our highly desired students.

Academic Excellence for a Successful Career

With our small class sizes, you’ll get the personal attention and academic excellence you need to thrive. In your business analytics courses, you’ll learn essential skills for today’s business needs.

Data Visualization

Database Management

Statistical Programming

Data Mining

Machine Learning

Big Data

Applied Problem Solving

Ethical and legal understanding of Data Analytics

Communication of technical information to non-technical audiences

You’ll use a number of different computing software programs:

R

Python

SQL

Hadoop

Power BI

Strong Ties to Seattle’s Global Tech Industry

Located in the dynamic tech hub of Seattle, we’ve cultivated strong partnerships with innovative, leading-edge corporations and data-focused technology companies in our global city. Opportunities abound for internships and careers at such well-known companies as Microsoft, Boeing, Costco, and Amazon, as well as at the multitude of smaller companies and startups located here.

High-Demand Albers Business Degree Graduates

As a highly desired graduate in a high-demand career, you’ll find many opportunities right after graduation. Here are some job titles and companies for recent grads:

Data Scientist, Deloitte

Business Data Analyst, CUNA Mutual

Associate Business Data Analysis, The Hartford Financial Services

Business Intelligence Consultant, Dimensional Insight

BI Engineer, Little Caesars

Research Analyst, McKinsey & Company

Quantitative Analyst, Cadeo Group
